content:
postCode

postCodepostal code contains a numerical or alphanumeric code used as part of a postal address to simplify sorting or delivery of mail. [3.6.2 Addresses ]

    Character Data
    Note

    The position and nature of postal codes is highly country-specific; the conventions appropriate to the country concerned should be used.

    Example
    <postCode>HR1 3LR</postCode>
